page.title: 13RECREATION: Sports Clubs
page.content: Bolholt Boxing club is situated on Walshaw Road.It has its own ring and fully furnished gym, which includes weights and an exercise bike.It is open on Monday and Wednesday nights and Sunday mornings.Wednesday evenings are for juniors. There are a number of Cricket clubs in the area- All Saints, Walshaw, Woodbank, and Tottington St.Johns.They all cover a wide age range and have their own pavilions. In the area there are a number of popular Youth Clubs such as Brandlesholme,All Saints, and Elton. Elton organizes a number of outings and has a full size snooker table.St.Francis meets in St.Francis house and is run by the local vicar. There is a new arcade opened over the mini-market shop on Tottington Road.It has various amusements.
